amendment.description: An amendment to require the Army Corps of Engineers, the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service, the National Park Service, and the U.S. Geological Survey to lead an effort to slow the spread of Asian Carp in the Ohio River basin and tributaries.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Kelly (PA) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Kelly (PA).
